attributes.action: We need a new national grooming gangs inquiry
attributes.additional_details: We need a national inquiry into the grooming scandal and hopefully this petition will be the key to unlock the deeply rooted secrets.
attributes.background: It is an absolute travesty that these heinous crimes, which have destroyed the lives of countless vulnerable young girls, have been allowed to persist for so long without a comprehensive national inquiry to uncover the full extent of this epidemic and hold those responsible to account.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition:
 
Launch a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
